plot outline: Raaj and Jessie , A newly married happy couple settled in a Private luxury house, Encounter unnatural and unbelievable situations followed by series of trouble emotionally, physically and mentally .The protagonist Raaj challenges the situations and gets his share of Revenge .
title: My Name Is Raja
akas: My Name is Raja (India, English title)
